##### FAQs
What is LANDED?
We make hiring hourly employees easier.
Hiring the best talent for your front-line hourly employees is the key for your business to thrive. But, labor is the number one pain point facing the restaurant and hospitality industry and amid high turnover rates, finding high quality talent takes time.
LANDED takes care of everything, so your business stays stay staffed while saving time and money.
We handle your sourcing, vetting, engaging, interview scheduling, and hiring for team members up to managers. We integrate with your existing ATS and HR systems, so your managers don‚Äôt need to learn any thing new.
Whether you‚Äôre a business or job seeker, LANDED can help you:
  * Boost candidate sourcing across job boards and social media
  * Pre-screen candidates
  * Automate interview scheduling
  * Enable SMS text messaging
  * Engage candidates 24/7 via conversational AI and our Recruitment Specialist team
  * Integrate with your existing ATS, HRIS, Indeed, Google / Outlook systems
  * Access real-time hiring insights across locations and roles
  * Hire high quality candidates faster


You can read all about our story [here](https://www.gotlanded.com/<https:/www.gotlanded.com/about>)!
Book a [demo](https://www.gotlanded.com/<https:/hire.gotlanded.com/employer_demo>) today!
Why should I use LANDED?
LANDED takes care of all your recruiting to save you time and money. Think sourcing, vetting, engaging, interviewing, and hiring with no more manual work and 15+ hours of time savings each week.
We can help you:
  * Get staffed

LANDED is available in all 50 of the United States, including Hawaii and Alaska. 
How much does LANDED cost?
LANDED does not charge job seekers to get matched or apply to jobs.
We only charge clients a flat rate per location for the LANDED platform and usage-based rate for LANDED advertising. You can [chat us](https://www.gotlanded.com/<https:/www.gotlanded.com/>) with your questions, we have agents ready to assist you 24/7!

##### FAQs
What is LANDED?
We make hiring hourly employees easier.
Hiring the best talent for your front-line hourly employees is the key for your business to thrive. But, labor is the number one pain point facing the restaurant and hospitality industry and amid high turnover rates, finding high quality talent takes time.
LANDED takes care of everything, so your business stays stay staffed while saving time and money.
We handle your sourcing, vetting, engaging, interview scheduling, and hiring for team members up to managers. We integrate with your existing ATS and HR systems, so your managers don‚Äôt need to learn any thing new.
Whether you‚Äôre a business or job seeker, LANDED can help you:
  * Boost candidate sourcing across job boards and social media

  * Engage candidates 24/7 via conversational AI and our Recruitment Specialist team
  * Integrate with your existing ATS, HRIS, Indeed, Google / Outlook systems
  * Access real-time hiring insights across locations and roles
  * Hire high quality candidates faster

### LANDED: Streamlining Hiring with Video and AI

**Overview**
Founded in 2019 and hailing from Y Combinator's W19 batch, LANDED is a San Francisco based startup that serves as a marketplace for businesses to efficiently hire employees‚Äîparticularly in the fast-paced sectors of restaurant and hospitality. With a lean team of just four, they'd quickly made a name for themselves by transforming how companies recruit.

**Mission & Approach**
LANDED's mission is clear: simplify and expedite the hiring process. Their platform combines generative AI with video technology, simplifying the vetting process, improving candidate quality, and facilitating faster engagement through text messaging. The idea is to meet candidates where they are‚Äîprimarily on their phones‚Äîenhancing response rates and reducing time-to-hire.

### Core Features

1. **Generative AI**: Helps businesses identify and match with any type of candidate they desire, ensuring quality hires.
2. **Customizable Vetting**: Employers can tailor their hiring processes to fit specific needs, providing more personalized experiences.
3. **Intelligent Matching**: Data-driven insights automatically recommend the best candidates based on defined criteria.
4. **Fast Engagement**: Automated text messaging allows businesses to connect with candidates immediately, enhancing communication.
5. **Recruitment Tools**: Includes job board and social media advertising alongside analytics for data-driven hiring decisions.

### Use Cases & Impact
LANDED is versatile, suitable for various hiring needs‚Äîfrom hourly workers to management-level roles. Businesses can fill roles swiftly before important events like grand openings and can address high turnover, especially common in the restaurant industry. Their technology has proven impactful, allowing users to save time and reduce administrative burdens. The testimonials from over 500 partner brands reflect significant time savings and improved candidate quality‚Äîsome reporting a 33% interview-to-hire ratio.

### Current Developments
Recently, LANDED expanded its capabilities by partnering with Tao Group Hospitality to incorporate advanced generative AI into hiring practices. This move is expected to further enhance efficiencies and quality in recruitment.

### Conclusion
In a world where finding the right talent quickly can define the success of a business, LANDED stands out as a valuable ally. Their innovative approach, leveraging both AI and the human touch through personalized conversations, illustrates a compelling model for modern recruitment. For businesses looking to rethink their hiring, LANDED offers an engaging way to make hires‚Äîfast and effectively. 

To learn more or book a demo, visit [LANDED](https://www.gotlanded.com).
